pullrequest.title: save configuration to the default location on exit

content.raw:
I had another idea. How about adding a new `<save_on_exit>` option to the `.config` file? I implemented it in [this branch](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/branches/compare/save_conf_on_exit%0Ddefault#diff). By default, it preserves the current behavior. The next option should save the configuration automatically:


```
#!c++

<window>
  ...
  <save_on_exit>true</save_on_exit>
  ...
</window>
```

If @stonier and @chapulina agree, I'll add a test and create the pull request.
